# Interface SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface

Interface for configuring speech synthesis configuration.

interface SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface {  
inferenceConfig?: [SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfigInterface);  
modelId?: string;  
postprocessingConfig?: [SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface);  
preprocessingConfig?: [SpeechSynthesisPreprocessingConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisPreprocessingConfigInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

inferenceConfig? modelId? postprocessingConfig? preprocessingConfig?

## Properties

### `Optional`inferenceConfig

inferenceConfig?: [SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisInferenceConfigInterface)

The inference configuration for the speech synthesis.

### `Optional`modelId

modelId?: string

The model ID (v2 or v3) for the speech synthesis. If not set, the v2 model will be used by default.

### `Optional`postprocessingConfig

postprocessingConfig?: [SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisPostprocessingConfigInterface)

The postprocessing configuration for the speech synthesis.

### `Optional`preprocessingConfig

preprocessingConfig?: [SpeechSynthesisPreprocessingConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisPreprocessingConfigInterface)

The preprocessing configuration for the speech synthesis.
